title: Plat Support LFT
body:
I am a support main looking for a team that is going to take the team seriously and is organised. I will be able to put time aside for games as often as is needed. Will be in for tournaments and am willing to both give and take advice as it comes. I will comply to all needs and have teamspeak3 as well as a server that we can use. Thankyou for your time and consideration, my details are below:

IGN: S0lution     - First O is a Zero
Age: 20
Preferred Position: Support
Favourite Champions: Thresh, Janna, Nami
Location: Newcastle, NSW
